name: Fuzzy Logic
overview: It's returned... The bugs are back! The screws are loose. In this side-angled perspective platformer, created in AMOS by Chris Banks you must fix the bugs and tighten the screws, drop in-capacitators where you must to stun the baddies so you can jump on them and take them out. So grab your wrench and get to work in this sequel to Weird in Edgeways.
